{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot | youtube.com/GamerRobot","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1545616,"totalDownVotes":103903,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[🔥 🔵 UPDATE] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":180432,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥 🔵 UPDATE 17 Part 2 OUT NOW 
New awakening, new island, new boss raid, new weapon, and LOTS MORE! 

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2300
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Soul, and Dragon.

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2389098,"totalDownVotes":169534,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[💰 2x] Pet Simulator X!","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":134545,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Pet Simulator X is the latest and greatest game in the Pet Simulator Series with tons of new features, worlds to explore, and hundreds of super cool pets!

💰 Collect coins to buy hundreds of eggs!

🗺️ Unlock new worlds like the floating islands!
✔️ Collect and trade pets with other players!
✨ ENCHANT and UPGRADE pets or fuse them together!
😎 Collect HUNDREDS of unique pets!

- 😺 Cat Hoverboard!?
+ TONS MORE!


🧡 Made with love by Preston

🔔 Follow for game updates! 🔔","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1049179,"totalDownVotes":210089,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🎉 [SEASON 4!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":75600,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥🔥🔥 Updates every Friday at 3:00pm PST 🔥🔥🔥

How to play BedWars:

🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the game!

✨ Play custom modes like SkyWars and Lucky Block!

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":800411,"totalDownVotes":55972,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[UPD 23] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":36510,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!

✨ The possibilities are endless!

🎁 Latest Update:

- 12 New Fighters + 1 Divine

- Level cap increased to 275!
- Bug fixes + balance changes + improvements ","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":967588,"totalDownVotes":78516,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":43915,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1571454,"totalDownVotes":87115,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":26261,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎁 The winter event has been extended 30 days to allow for time to complete Bee Bear's new quests for the Snow Cub Buddy

Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for Honey, Treats and codes! https://www.roblox.com/groups/3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2747776,"totalDownVotes":424093,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":164929,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay. ","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":5015391,"totalDownVotes":435257,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":32642,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 
Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4546767,"creatorName":"Pressure Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":268787,"totalDownVotes":14284,"universeId":2937673012,"name":"[2X] ⚡Clicker Simulator","placeId":7560156054,"playerCount":27110,"imageToken":"T_7560156054_e0eb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEW CODE AT 275K LIKES! 🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/1226491/RW","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3806331,"totalDownVotes":474583,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":14181,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":12420072,"creatorName":"Lightning Dragon Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":144039,"totalDownVotes":8412,"universeId":3262314006,"name":"[UPD8.1+ 2x☯⏩] Weapon Fighting Simulator","placeId":8554378337,"playerCount":23206,"imageToken":"T_8554378337_148f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🥋 Welcome to Weapon Fighting Simulator 🥋

Stay alive.","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2629560,"totalDownVotes":341355,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":21812,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Venture Lagoons","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":657088,"totalDownVotes":62976,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update 3 ❄️]King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":21654,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Cr Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":862283,"totalDownVotes":95737,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":10333,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.9』 🏹✨
➢ New trading system; Trade Stands! Trade Items! and multiple other QoL features
➢ 7 new Stand skins!
➢ 4 new Cosmetics!
➢ and more in game!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":658506,"totalDownVotes":299904,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":13816,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4004300,"totalDownVotes":431603,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":19196,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.4
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4858626,"totalDownVotes":655856,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":12195,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Up Next: Something special.

Latest update info:
🔥 - Tow Trucks! Finally! Find it in the small town.
🗺 - Fullscreen Minimap! Just click!
🧭 - Waypoints! Set them in your map and never get lost.
🎺 - Horn Customization! Check the Garage!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":328678,"totalDownVotes":59694,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ CROCODILE + RYUKO ] ABA","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":6922,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"ANIME BATTLE ARENA

","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":456406,"totalDownVotes":27683,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[💖VALENTINES💖] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":6189,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":250,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
